timeline.bodyText: As a possible performance optimization, since we're skipping data files anyway, perhaps instead of the dvObjectService.findAll() above we could get just a list of dataverses and datasets. I don't know if it would help with performance or not, or if performance is even a problem.

replies.author: ekraffmiller

timeline.bodyText: I go back and forth on cleanup like this. One one hand it's nice not to junk up your dev environment with test data. On the other hand, if the delete fails and the whole test suite fails as a result, it's frustrating. One thing I sometimes do is put the delete calls in but don't assert that they succeed. No need to changes anything here. It's just something that popped in my head.
